trans-unit.source: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una forma geometrica 2D definita dalla combinazione di due <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that CombinedGeometry combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che CombinedGeometry combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a CombinedGeometry, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: Le geometrie possono essere combinate in diversi modi: utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, una CombinedGeometry, o il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>Crea una geometria composta da una o più <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A CombinedGeometry uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Un CombinedGeometry Usa un'operazione booleana specificata per combinare l'area descritta da due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: - The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the CombinedGeometry object.
trans-unit.target: -Statica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>metodo la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe si comporta esattamente allo stesso modo dell'oggetto CombinedGeometry.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using a CombinedGeometry to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: Da coinvolgere prestare particolare attenzione quando si utilizza un CombinedGeometry per eseguire un'unione come può essere dispendioso in termini di CPU.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>sarà più idoneo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: Use a CombinedGeometry only when any of the following apply: - The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un CombinedGeometry solo quando una qualsiasi delle condizioni seguenti:-operazione geometrica non è un'unione.

trans-unit.source: - Either of the geometries have a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: -Delle geometrie avere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>valore <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>e intersecate le geometrie (vale a dire il <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>è rilevante).</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: - Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: -Time non è un problema, ma è lo spazio (ad esempio, se la geometria viene creata una sola volta e quindi memorizzata nella cache).

trans-unit.source: Typically, CombinedGeometry produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, CombinedGeometry produce l'output di dimensioni inferiori rispetto a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: -La geometria risultante verrà tracciata o utilizzata in un percorso di animazione e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>non fornisce la struttura desiderata.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A CombinedGeometry is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto Freezable funzionalità A CombinedGeometry è un tipo di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>funzionalità, ad esempio il blocco e la clonazione, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*> e oggetti

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo mediante il quale `geometry1` e `geometry2` vengono combinate.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> oggetti, <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo mediante il quale `geometry1` e `geometry2` vengono combinate.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*> applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>applicato per la <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica il rettangolo di selezione di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **Nota:** questo metodo non prende in considerazione le penne.

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: Se le animazioni sono presenti, i valori di base di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>oggetto vengono utilizzati per calcolare il rettangolo di selezione.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di selezione di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (), ma non possono risolvere non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> era di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiate, ma i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> object of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>

trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method by which the two geometries (specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*> properties) are combined.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il metodo con cui due geometrie (specificato da di <> </> *> e <> </> *> proprietà) vengono combinate.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The method by which <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*> are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo mediante il quale <> </> *> e <> </> *> vengono combinate.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'area riempita.

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: Il calcolo tolleranza di errore.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Specifica la modalità di interpretazione della tolleranza di errore.

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this combined geometry.
trans-unit.target: L'area riempita di questa geometria combinata.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto è vuoto.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> è vuota; in caso contrario, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: Determina se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto può presentare segmenti curvi.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> oggetto può presentare segmenti curvi; in caso contrario, **false**.
